mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.perms IS NOT NULL AND m.perms != '' AND m.status = 1
SELECT FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_user WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (shop_id, username, password, nickname, phone, email, avatar, status) VALUES (#{shopId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, avatar = #{avatar}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
